attributes.action: Make Hotpoint replace all faulty goods free of charge as it's there fault
attributes.additional_details: I have personal information & that from many others that have been unfairly treated by hotpoint, just as I have, purchasing there faulty goods, that have been put on product recall, to be told by hotpoint it can be modified or can pay a further fee for  replacement that is substandard to our current models
attributes.background: thousands of disgruntled public are left frustrated by the lack of customer service provided by hotpoint,  & are being forced to spend out for replacements when the fault lies with hotpoint

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You can find more information about making a report to Trading Standards here:

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/get-more-help/report-to-trading-standards/
